eu_initiatives:
Our main focus is on the digital policy agenda, including the digital single market, the new European electronic communications code, data protection, intellectual property, cyber security, consumer policy and internet governance.  
 
We also follow wider EU policies covering the Internal Market, pensions, competition, innovation, employment as well as economic relations with the EU’s major trading partners and plurilateral and multilateral trade negotiations (at WTO level).  
 
As a company head quartered in the UK and with a European-wide footprint serving businesses and governmental institutions with ICT solutions, we take a strong interest in the Brexit debate and in the future of EU-UK relations.  
 
Given BT’s commitment to reduce its own and its customers’ CO2 emissions we take an active interest in Climate Change policy and debates around Green ICT and energy efficiency. We further follow policies and activities to support digital skills and TechLiteracy.

goals__remit:
BT’s purpose is to use the power of communications to make a better world. It is one of the world’s leading providers of communications services and solutions, serving customers in 180 countries. Its principal activities include the provision of networked IT services globally; local, national and international telecommunications services to its customers for use at home, at work and on the move; broadband, TV and internet products and services; and converged fixed-mobile products and services.  
 
BT consists of six customer-facing lines of business: Consumer, EE, Business and Public Sector, Global Services, Wholesale and Ventures, and Openreach. 
 
For the year ended 31 March 2017, BT Group’s reported revenue was £24,062m with reported profit before taxation of £2,354m.  
 
British Telecommunications plc (BT) is a wholly-owned subsidiary of BT Group plc and encompasses virtually all businesses and assets of the BT Group. BT Group plc is listed on stock exchanges in London and New York.  
 
 
For more information, visit www.btplc.com
